author: M Janssen
review: Went on holiday in Sri Lanka with our family in February. Asique from Ayaan tours provided, among other things, our transport between our travel destinations. While traveling we were taken by Asique to many beautiful destinations and through him we got to know the culture and the country well. A fantastic friendly man who speaks very good English and knows a lot about the country and the places. Good service and a reliable person who we have taken to our hearts. Highly recommended to contact him if you want to see the real Sri Lanka, want to be taken care of and are looking for a reliable person who keeps his promises.

author: C Sparkes
review: Asique was an excellent driver and Tour guide. He has lived and worked in the US so his English is also excellent. He owns a nice large van, perfect for a group with their luggage.

author: Amir Khan
review: Our recent trip to Sri Lanka from 24th November to 2nd December was made truly unforgettable thanks to the incredible efforts of our guide and driver, Mr. Asique by Ayaan Travels. His masterclass in guidance and support ensured that every moment of our trip was seamless and enriching. To begin with, his luxurious and supremely comfortable vehicle made long journeys an absolute pleasure. More than that, his punctuality was impeccable - always arriving on time with a professional yet friendly demeanor that made us feel at ease throughout the trip.
